title: Laptop freezes when playing League!
body: So this problem occured a couple weeks ago. Whenever my laptop is plugged my charger, my league is fine. But when I unplug my charger from my laptop, my game starts freezing constantly in between 30-60 seconds. My only solution is to keep my laptop plugged in but I would like my battery to last as long as it can. I already downloaded Hextech Repair Tool but it didnt help.

replies.body: There may be a few reasons for this happening like hardware issues, but your drivers could be causing frame drops too.  The [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide would be a solid first step towards ruling out possibilities and getting this resolved.  Let me know how that works out!
